page.title: 08SANDHUTTON GYMKHANA FAIR
page.content: I WENT TO THE FAIR AT HALF PAST NINE AND HELPED SET OUT THE STALL THAT I WAS HELPING ON.I WAS HELPING ON THE KNOCKING DOWN THE CANS AND THE DART STALL AND ANOTHER BOY WAS HELPING ON SMASHING THE POTS.WE MADE ABOUT Â£12. AT 2 O'CLOCK I WENT TO HELP MY DAD ON THE GYMKANA RING.I WAS HELPING ON THE APPLE AND BUCKET AND A RACE WHERE THE HORSES GO ROUND IN A CIRCLE AND A PERSON IN THE MIDDLE WAVES A FLAG. WHEN HE TURNS IT UPSIDE DOWN THE PEOPLE ON THE HORSES JUMP OFF AND RUN TOWARDS THE MIDDLE AND STAND ON A PIECE OF CARPET. WHILE THIS WAS GOING ON SOME MEN FROM OUR VILLAGE HAD A TUG OF WAR AGAINST A TEAM FROM THE ARMY. THE FIRST PULL THE ROPE SNAPPED SO THEY GOT A NEW ROPE AND STARTED AGAIN. WE WON!
